html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-13902011-12-01,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1634 – Food Additive)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1634 - FOOD ADDITIVE) in order to enable the use of calcium sulphate as a carrier of benzoyl peroxide used in liquid whey destined for the manufacture of dried whey products, other than those for use in infant formula, at a maximum level of use of 0.3% of the dried whey product.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0282 Publication Date: 2011-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1634 – Food Additive)
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1634 - FOOD ADDITIVE) in order to enable the use of calcium sulphate as a carrier of benzoyl peroxide used in liquid whey destined for the manufacture of dried whey products, other than those for use in infant formula, at a maximum level of use of 0.3% of the dried whey product.
